description:
Nozaki passes by the gymnasium to find his underclassman, Wakamatsu, being pummeled by Yuzuki. As the basketball team`s helper, Yuzuki seemed rather overzealous about going after just Wakamatsu, which causes him a lot of stress, which had turned into insomnia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Cast a Spell on You
魔法をかけて, あ・げ・る♥
